T

TakeWaterAction - Class in game.actions
This class is used to enable player to refil water from fountains into water bottle Hence, whenever the user perform this action, it will add that particular water instance on player's bottle
TakeWaterAction(Water, Fountain) - Constructor for class game.actions.TakeWaterAction
constructor
TALL - game.Status
use this status to tell that current instance has "grown".
TELEPORT - game.Status
use this status to indicate an actor can teleport
TeleportAction - Class in game.actions
TeleportAction is an action that allows the actor to teleport to the desired location.
TeleportAction(WarpPipe) - Constructor for class game.actions.TeleportAction
Constructor of TeleportAction
TeleportManager - Class in game.managers
TeleportManager is a global singleton manager responsible to teleport the actor to the desired location It will only be called if the actor executes TeleportAction The reason to have this TeleportManager class is that we need a way to keep track of the previous WarpPipe and store the coordinates of the warp pipe in the second map.
THIRD_PRIORITY - Static variable in class game.actors.enemies.Enemy
A constant integer that will be used as a key in the hash map to indicate which behaviour is the third priority
tick(Location) - Method in class game.grounds.fountains.Fountain
to keep track of turns in the game deduct one slot of water from the fountain when refilled by player or drank by enemies store the value of current turn once content of the fountain becomes 0 reset the fountain content back to maximum (10) when the difference between current turn and turn where water run out is 5
tick(Location) - Method in class game.grounds.highgrounds.HighGround
Called once per turn, so that Ground can also experience the joy of time.

tick(Location) - Method in class game.items.Fire
remove the fire from the ground if the remainingTurn is equal to 0, else do 20 damage to the actor that standing on it
tick(Location) - Method in class game.items.magicalitems.PowerStar
keep track of number of turns the power star is on the ground decrement the turn value by 1 after every turn remove power star from the map once value of turn reaches 0
tick(Location, Actor) - Method in class game.items.magicalitems.MagicalItem
allow actor to consume magical item that exists in their inventory disable actor's consume action after actor consumes the item
tick(Location, Actor) - Method in class game.items.magicalitems.PowerStar
keep track of number of turns the power star is in player's inventory decrement the turn value by 1 after every turn remove power star from the inventory once value of turn reaches 0
